item.description:
Ten Rod Road is also known as Rt. 165. Head west on Rt. 165 from the junction of Rt. 3 for 2.6 miles and look for the sign for the J B Hudson Trail on your right. The lot is set back from the road.

This will be a 4 mile hike, including a loop around Breakheart Pond, that could take up to two hours to complete. Mostly moderate with some steep rocky and wet uphill hiking. This is a very sweet trail.

Please be prepared with good hiking boots, water and insect repellant. Please read the R I Hiking Clubs liability waiver and understand that it is a condition of your participation for this and all activities with the group.
item.how_to_find_us: meet in the lot that is set back from the road at the sign

group.name: Rhode Island Hiking Club " Walks and Rambles "

item.name: J. B. Hudson Trail, Weber #13
